section.title: oVirt Engine Client Requirements
section.para: To access the Administration Portal, you need a client with a supported web browser. The Administration Portal supports the following clients and browsers:

listitem.para:
Client
Fedora 5.8+ (i386, AMD64 and Intel 64)
Fedora 6.2+ (i386, AMD64 and Intel 64)
Windows XP,
Windows 7 (x86, AMD64 and Intel 64), and
Windows 2008/R2 (x86, AMD64 and Intel 64).

Browser
Mozilla Firefox 10 and higher on Fedora.
Internet Explorer 8 and higher on Windows.

section.para: To access the User Portal, you need a thin client with a supported web browser. The User Portal supports the following clients and browsers:

listitem.para:
Client
Fedora 5.8+ (i386, AMD64 and Intel 64)
Fedora 6.2+ (i386, AMD64 and Intel 64)
Windows XP
Windows XP Embedded (XPe)
Windows 7 (x86, AMD64 and Intel 64)
Windows Embedded Standard 7
Windows 2008/R2 (x86, AMD64 and Intel 64)
Windows Embedded Standard 2009
ovirt-engine Certified Linux-based thin clients

Browser
Mozilla Firefox 10 and higher on Fedora, with the SPICE plugin installed (provided by the spice-xpi package).
Internet Explorer 8 and higher on Windows, with the SPICE ActiveX control installed.
